short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nantar is a chrome extension that allows users to store video links and links in general.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Frustrated with not finding the one long lost page or video that you were viewing like ages ago. 

Nantar allows you to add links with a special view for supported video links. 
Some of the key features are

- A clean UI with simple design so that you open them at a glance.
- Special one click button for youtube video that allow you to save them.
- Special options view to check all the saved links at the same time.
- All data is stored locally.
- A quick access list to open the most recently saved links.


Upcoming planned features
- Cloud save based on user
- Mobile integration
